channel.title: Natalie Grasser's Blog
channel.description: Recent content on Natalie Grasser's Blog

item.title: Where the Heck to Start
item.description: How to set up a blog - where the heck do I start? To set up a blog, there are sooooo many uncountable ways. You can use an existing platform, like dev.to or medium, creating a “new” blog from scratch with Wordpress, or use GitHub pages. As I already had an account for GitHub, and feel quite comfortable with it, I decided for as setup with Github pages and hugo. So, I began with creating an empty repository with my username, “natgra.

item.title: My first post - or the throughs about deciding for a blog
item.description: My first post - or the thoughs about deciding for a blog To have a blog, or not to have one I thought about it quite some time: starting a blog. It seems like an adventure. You need to figure out a few things in advance, like what do you want to talk about?, which platform do I want to use?, and where the heck do I start?. It seemed to be a lot of work, so here is my journey and why I started:
